rule_text;: deny traverse on nodes (e:Employee) where e.age > 30 to member;
grant delete on nodes (u:User) where u.status = "active" to guest;
deny traverse on nodes (p:Patient) where p.flag = true to doctor;
deny delete on relationships (m:MANAGES) where m.rank > 5 to admin;
grant remove{rank} on relationships (m:MANAGES) to admin;
grant delete on nodes (d:Document) to editor;
deny modify{title} on nodes (d:Document) where d.version > 1 to editor;
grant remove{title} on nodes (d:Document) to editor;
deny traverse on nodes (app:Application) where app.state = "beta" to user;
deny add{tag} on nodes (f:File) where f.owner = "root" to admin;
grant remove{tag} on nodes (f:File) to admin;
deny traverse on nodes (sys:System) where sys.mode = "secure" to dev;
deny traverse on nodes (srv:Server) where srv.load > 70 to admin;
deny traverse on nodes (emp:Employee) where emp.salary > 5000 to auditor;
grant remove{salary} on nodes (emp:Employee) to manager;
deny modify{name} on nodes (p:Patient) where p.critical = true to nurse;
deny traverse on relationships (w:WORKS_WITH) where w.level = "high" to hr;
deny traverse on nodes (acc:Account) where acc.balance < 0 to operator;
deny modify{owner} on nodes (f:File) where f.sensitive = true to admin;
grant remove{email} on nodes (u:User) to admin;
deny traverse on nodes (t:Task) where t.priority = "urgent" to staff;
deny traverse on relationships (rel:LINKS) where rel.weight > 10 to system;
deny delete on nodes (msg:Message) where msg.flagged = true to moderator;
grant remove{flagged} on nodes (msg:Message) to moderator;
deny modify{phone} on nodes (c:Customer) where c.vip = true to agent;
deny traverse on nodes (ord:Order) where ord.total > 1000 to auditor;
grant remove{total} on nodes (ord:Order) to accountant;
deny add{rating} on nodes (prod:Product) where prod.discontinued = true to manager;
grant remove{rating} on nodes (prod:Product) to manager;
